body:
title: Home meta title: SlickCMS template: home order: 1 {{ blog title }} ======================

Content Management System that takes 30 seconds to install. Extremely easy to use. No coding skills needed. Super fast. Works everywhere.

Download Documentation Source Code Features --------------------- - Drag-and-drop installation - Easy to add content - Clean URLs - Super fast loading and ultra performance - Plugins & Themes - Extremely tiny - Free & Open Source Requires: Apache and PHP 5.3 Do I need to know how to code? --------------------- No. SlickCMS is a blog designed to be set up and running in 30 seconds by anyone. The only thing you'll need to learn is how to upload files to your server (here's how to do it in 5 minutes: [FTP guide]({{ blog url }}ftp-guide)). You will also want to check out how **[Markdown]({{ blog url }}markdown-guide)** works so you can add images, titles, bold text and make your site look pretty and fancy (You can write HTML too). How tiny is SlickCMS? --------------------- SlickCMS is extremely tiny weighting less than 0.1MB. This site you are seeing right now is using SlickCMS. It has a blog, tutorials, guides and many more… If you took a photo with your phone right now it would equal at least 25 websites like this one (2MB / 80KB = 25). How does it work? --------------------- You create files such as this: 
title: 		About me


Hello, my name is **Xavi** and I am from Barcelona.
And SlickCMS automatically generates everything, [learn more]({{ blog url }}documentation). ### Technical details SlickCMS is a database-less blogging system that auto-generates static files which means pages are loaded really really fast, faster than Wordpress, Joomla, Blogger and 99% of any other content management and blog systems you can think about. It is a great option for cheap servers and old computers. And also if you want to run hundreds of blogs without compromising your CPU.
